00055 void script_operatortypes(void)
00056 {
00057     WM_operatortype_append(SCRIPT_OT_python_file_run);
00058     WM_operatortype_append(SCRIPT_OT_reload);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void script_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00062 {
00063     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Script", SPACE_SCRIPT, 0);
00064 
00065     /* TODO - this is just while we have no way to load a text datablock */
00066     RNA_string_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "SCRIPT_OT_python_file_run", PKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL|KM_SHIFT|KM_ALT, 0)->ptr, "filepath", "test.py");
00067 }
